DOC.brief_summary: Green tea one popular beverage world . It believe beneficial effect prevention treatment many disease , one reduce LDL-C . The aim study examine effect supplement contain GTE obese high LDL level .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Green Tea Extract Obese Women With High Level LDL
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , crossover placebo-controlled clinical trial
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 65 year 2. body mass index ( BMI ) > = 27 kg/m2 3. fasting lowdensitylipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL ) > = 130mg/dl ( 4 ) willing participate trial . 1. serum alanine transaminase > 80 U/L 2. serum creatinine > 1.8 mg/dl 3. breast feeding pregnancy 4. heart failure , acute myocardial infarction , stroke , heavy injury 5. condition suitable trial evaluate physician .
